scripts.clean-project: rm -rf android/app/build && rm -rf android/build && rm -rf $HOME/.gradle/caches/ && rm -f android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle
scripts.compile-app: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.generate-debug-apk: yarn clean-project && yarn compile-app && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.generate-release-apk: yarn clean-project && yarn compile-app && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.generate-bundle-release: yarn clean-project && yarn compile-app && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease && cd ..
